Title: Your SOC's ally against cyber threats: Microsoft Security Experts | BRK236
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Some SOCs need allies. Our experts detect, halt, and manage threats for you. Add proactive IR to prevent attacks before they start. Hear how we can bolster your SOC - see real-world outcomes, demos, and gain insights from people on the front lines.
